title: I just started earning, what are the best books available on finance and stock market for me to learn? - Quora

response.answer_text: The intelligent investor by Benjamin. I realised that most of the strategies are good for learning especially for beginners. In fact I read this book after 3 years with trading in nse, bse. My strategies, studies with funda analysis, technical analysis were very much similar to it. So which ever be the time, generation principles always remain same.
